mapper.select: select sum(population) as population from population where year = 2021;
select year, sum(population) as population from population group by year order by year;
select dong, sum(population) as population from population where year = 2021 group by year, dong order by year, dong;
select year, dong, sum(population) as population from population where year = #{year} group by year, dong order by year, dong;

select sex, sum(population) as population, round(sum(population)/(select sum(population) from population where year = 2021)*100, 1) as per from population where year = 2021 group by year, sex order by year, sex;

select dong, sex, sum(population) as population, round(sum(population)/(select sum(population) from population where year = 2021 and dong = #{dong})*100, 1) as per from population where year = 2021 and dong = #{dong} group by year, sex order by year, sex;
select year, age, sum(population) as population from population group by year, age order by year, age;
select dong, year, age, sum(population) as population from population where dong = #{dong} group by year, age order by year, age;
select year, item, sum(population) as population from item group by year, item order by year, item;
select year, dong, item, sum(population) as population from item where dong = #{dong} group by year, dong, item order by year, dogn, item;
